column4: Whenever I open a text file from a network in gedit, gedit randomly crashes.  Does anyone else have this problem? Or are you guys traditionalists with the command line?
anything in the logs? try running it from command line?
It will take a while beofore it crashes.
or try from command line   'gedit filename.txt'
I can't run gedit with the command line.
The server I'm using doesn't have a GUI.
The problem was gedit crashing occasionally when I opened a file on a server, Flannel and Mecha25
That's because the server is a terminal-based server.
then how does gedit crash when you try to use it?
I don't know what I do.  It just randomly crashes.
